laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial hostility score of 15 (maximum = 23) at baseline; reduced to 0 after 2 months, remained at 0 two months later, and was 2 after five months of desipramine treatment.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased from 15 to 0 after 2 months and remained 0 for two months; increased to 2 after five months.
Improved to 6 after treatment and remained at 6 three months later.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Hostility score was 16 at initial evaluation.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Dropped to 6 after treatment and remained at 6 three months later.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Hostility score was not specified, but episodes of anger attacks ceased with treatment.
